title: [Large-Scale] Universal Design for Learning (UDL) and Science Education Design for Students with Disabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific concepts and mobile device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Curriculum design reflecting accessibility challenges (physical/social) for students with disabilities and limitations in UDL (Universal Design for Learning) application

learning_goals: Learners can design UDL-based science education content that considers diverse cognitive/physical characteristics
Learners can analyze learning barriers (environmental/social factors) for students with disabilities and propose personalized support strategies
Learners can implement UDL application cases through project-based assessments in mobile microlearning environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
